channel.title: JumpBox, manage your own servers
channel.description:
They offer a free download but im sure you can all find your own way to get a licenced copy or w/e. Nice learning tool especially if you want to get in to content management software. I've been playing around with it recently just because of the speed and platform flexability. EDIT: I found this review. source: http://myopinioniseverything.blogspot.com/
Found this site recently, and it is the best find of my life. You'll find a lot more in the [size=11pt][b][url=http://pagead2.googlesyndication.com/pagead/iclk?sa=l&ai=BVkHvTBDERrbKHpSE0wSlz8Ulq6S7JLP3h98DxY23AQAQAiCUsukGKAM4AFDqxKSOA2C7vq6D0AqgAYXWtvoDsgEPd3d3LmJsb2dnZXIuY29tugEKMjUweDI1MF9hc8gBAdoB__gD6APGBPUDCAIAAA&num=0&adurl=http://www.jumpbox.com/jumpbox-for-the-joomla-content-management-system&client=ca-ref-pub-9506880595685696]site[/url][/b][/size]. On so many occasions i have given up on a localy hosted server, or a work web server due to the fact i couldn't spend the time setting it up and complete my work load. Or again due to the lack of motivation as mentioned in below posts. It is fully loaded with support for servers, forums (punBB), wiki, Jamoola, Trac and load, loads more. You can quickly and easily set up virtual drives with different setups to your requirements, and remove just as easily. A little word, taken from the site; Downloadable server software The easiest way to deploy server software on your local network. One click install Configuration requires just one click and you're off and running. Virtualized and portable JumpBoxes use virtualization and run exactly the same on Mac OS X, Windows and Linux. Easy data backup and restore All JumpBoxes include a built in backup and restore mechanism for data protection. A growing library The JumpBox Application Library is constantly evolving with new and updated applications. Get a jump start to usage JumpBoxes are a great platform for software evaluation, education and development. You'll find a lot more in the [size=11pt][b][url=http://pagead2.googlesyndication.com/pagead/iclk?sa=l&ai=BVkHvTBDERrbKHpSE0wSlz8Ulq6S7JLP3h98DxY23AQAQAiCUsukGKAM4AFDqxKSOA2C7vq6D0AqgAYXWtvoDsgEPd3d3LmJsb2dnZXIuY29tugEKMjUweDI1MF9hc8gBAdoB__gD6APGBPUDCAIAAA&num=0&adurl=http://www.jumpbox.com/jumpbox-for-the-joomla-content-management-system&client=ca-ref-pub-9506880595685696]site[/url][/b][/size].
Any torrent links would be appreciated

item.title: JumpBox, manage your own servers
item.dc:creator: @sup000 sup000
item.description:
@sup000 wrote:

They offer a free download but im sure you can all find your own way to get a licenced copy or w/e. Nice learning tool especially if you want to get in to content management software.
I’ve been playing around with it recently just because of the speed and platform flexability.

EDIT:
I found this review.
source: http://myopinioniseverything.blogspot.com/

Found this site recently, and it is the best find of my life.

You’ll find a lot more in the [size=11pt]site[/size].

On so many occasions i have given up on a localy hosted server, or a work web server due to the fact i couldn’t spend the time setting it up and complete my work load. Or again due to the lack of motivation as mentioned in below posts.

It is fully loaded with support for servers, forums (punBB), wiki, Jamoola, Trac and load, loads more. You can quickly and easily set up virtual drives with different setups to your requirements, and remove just as easily. A little word, taken from the site;

Downloadable server software
The easiest way to deploy server software on your local network.

One click install
Configuration requires just one click and you’re off and running.

Virtualized and portable
JumpBoxes use virtualization and run exactly the same on Mac OS X, Windows and Linux.

Easy data backup and restore
All JumpBoxes include a built in backup and restore mechanism for data protection.

A growing library
The JumpBox Application Library is constantly evolving with new and updated applications.

Get a jump start to usage
JumpBoxes are a great platform for software evaluation,
education and development.

You’ll find a lot more in the [size=11pt]site[/size].

Any torrent links would be appreciated
